JOB DESCRIPTION: Desired Experience: Exp:   0.6 4 yrs of experience in Xamarin     Qualification:   BE B Tech M Tech MCA and any Graduate     Desired profile:     We seek talented, self starter and self motivated engineering and technology background individuals with drive to learn and create Android and IOS app using Xamarin platform and C#.     Essential Skills and Experience:     Developing dynamic and interactive Android and IOS application using Xamarin platform in visual studio.   Should know the basic of Xamarin tool, C#, HTML5, Visual studio, ADO.Net, XAML, XML, SQLite, Jquery etc.   Should able to create basic android and IOS app using xamarin and C# in visual studio   Should have basic understanding of SQLite as well as Web API and web service to create dynamic and interactive Android and IOS app using Xamarin tool.   Knowledge of MSSQL and ability to write store procedure and SQL query like fetching data from single or multiple table using joins would be added advantage.   He should be solution oriented, self starter and self motivated person.   Should able to work on project under the guidance of tech lead and his tech mentor.   Good Communication skills and should able to write emails in English language   Eager to learn new things and take up challenges
